mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ACHV_REWARD (USER_ID, REWARD_ID, RECEIVED_DATE) VALUES (#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rewardId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
